item.title: The drafts
item.description: Half written, half baked. Coming soon to a full post near you… or not. The following are a collection of drafts. Ideas while bombs are falling over refugee camps, we’re here celebrating and making fun of death the anti-ai revolution you donâ€™t need social media - story of snapchat overdeliver on projects to continue working AI vs creativity - the backlash thats coming especially for AI art the story of the water jug from “the creative act” book your story is important, what about their story?
